info.name: Roblox Simplicity
info.description: Makes the ROBLOX site white and simplifies certain parts of it. Contains animations. Currently only tested on Google Chrome. Use in other browsers at own risk. Keep in mind that this is not even close to finished, and is likely to contain ugly inconveniences.
info.additionalInfo:
A MORE IMPORTANT NOTE THAN THE ONE BELOW: This theme is inactive. I am very unlikely to add or edit it anymore due to a lack of motivation when it comes to programming. Even if I were to get back into doing CSS, I am more likely to update Roblox Animated instead.

IMPORTANT NOTE: I will continue updating this theme again. ROBLOX reverted their catalog, but due to the way the CSS is put up in the avatar editor, I will not be able to add icons there.

You are by no means allowed to publish a remixed, edited or entirely copied version of this theme, nor are you allowed to take snippets of this theme and put it into your own work.

Credits for most icons used to http://www.flaticon.com/authors/madebyoliver from www.flaticon.com

Â©2017 sigve10
ROBLOX profile: https://www.roblox.com/users/3525248/profile

CHANGELOG:
1.0.5
+ New background for the ROBLOX avatar editor. At least I managed to put SOME change in there.
* Fixed voting buttons being weirdly positioned
* Made your robux more visible than it was before. Now you don't have to scroll all the way up to see it properly.
- Removed John Doe

1.0.4
+ Released an experimental dark mode (Not recommended to use). NOTE: This feature is put on hold while Stylish fixes their Style Settings.
* Fixed some minor issues.
- Removed John Doe

1.0.3
+ Added catalog icons for the category selector. These icons (with the exception of the gear icons) were made by ROBLOX for their mobile avatar editor, so full credits to them for those icons.
+ "Slight" addition to the avatar editor. --Note that this update doesn't have effect anymore due to the new ROBLOX avatar editor
- Removed John Doe

1.0.2:
* Minor visual changes.
- Removed John Doe

1.0.1:
+ Added a changelog in this description!
+ Made the gamepage more compact and smooth. NOTE: For extra game information hover your mouse over the game for a while.
- Removed that annoying loading circle (it blocked interactions and was shown too frequently).
- Removed John Doe

data.title: Pls fix it on the thing the roblox game names mash up and i want it fixed

style.css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.roblox.com/"), 
url-prefix("https://www.roblox.com/"), 
url-prefix("https://forum.roblox.com/"), 
url-prefix("http://forum.roblox.com/"), 
url-prefix("http://web.roblox.com/"), 
url-prefix("https://web.roblox.com/") {
	@keyframes card-Shade{ 0% {box-shadow: 0 0 0 1000px rgba(25,25,25,0.5) !important;} 80% {box-shadow: 0 0 0 1000px rgba(25,25,25,0.5) !important;} 100% {box-shadow: 0 0 0 1000px rgba(25,25,25,0.75) !important;} } @keyframes gamecards{ 0% {width: 100%;} 40%{width:110%;} 100%{width: 200%;} } /* @keyframes loading{ 0%{opacity: 0.5;} 90%{opacity: 0.5;} 100%{opacity: 1;} } @keyframes loadingCircle { 0% { transform: rotate(0deg); opacity: 1;} 90% { transform: rotate(1440deg); opacity: 1;} 95% { opacity: 1;} 100%{opacity: 0;} } .container-main:after { z-index: 5000000000 !important; position: fixed; top: 50%; left: 50%; margin-top: -60px; margin-left: -120px; border: 16px solid #f3f3f3; border-top: 16px solid #3498db; border-radius: 50%; width: 120px; height: 120px; transform: rotate(1440deg); animation: loadingCircle 2s linear 1; opacity: 0; }*/ .avatar-back{ background-image: url(http://www.wallpaperup.com/uploads/wallpapers/2012/07/04/5256/big_thumb_690cf657788ea89a9ecabc258a0388f1.jpg) !important; filter: blur(); } .alert-info{ background: none; text-shadow: black 0 0 5px } .alert-info a:link, .alert-info a:visited, .alert-info a:hover, .alert-info a:active, .alert-info .alert-link:link, .alert-info .alert-link:visited, .alert-info .alert-link:hover, .alert-info .alert-link:active{ color: white; } #rbx-body{ font-family: 'Roboto', sans-serif !important; color: #000 !important; font-weight: 300 !important; letter-spacing: -0.03em; background-color: #fff; } body{ animation: loading 2s; } .alert-info .rbx-left-col{ transition: box-shadow 1s, background-color 0.5s, width 0.5s !important; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0) !important; } .btn-buy-md{ color: #fff; } .icon-chat-party-label, .icon-chat-party-avatar{ background-position: 0 !important; background-image: url(https://image.flaticon.com/icons/svg/149/149744.svg); background-size: contain !important; filter: invert() !important; } .rbx-left-col.nav-show{ background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important; box-shadow: 0 0 0px 100000px rgba(25,25,25,0.75) !important; } .theme-dark .chat .title-wrap .channel-name, .rbx-header .nav-menu-title, .rbx-header .nav-menu-title:link, .rbx-header .nav-menu-title:active, .rbx-header .nav-menu-title:hover, .rbx-header .nav-menu-title:visited, .rbx-header .nav-menu-title:focus, .rbx-header .age-bracket-label, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar-icon-group li .rbx-menu-item, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar-icon-group li .rbx-menu-item:link, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar-icon-group li .rbx-menu-item:active, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar-icon-group li .rbx-menu-item:hover, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar-icon-group li .rbx-menu-item:visited, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar-icon-group li .rbx-menu-item:focus,h1, h2, h3, h4, h5{ color: #000 !important; } #navigation, .game-card-container, .section-content{ box-shadow: none; } .rbx-header .rbx-navbar li .nav-menu-title, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar li .nav-menu-title:hover, .rbx-header .rbx-navbar li .nav-menu-title:focus{ transition: background-color 0.3s, border-radius 0.3s; } #header, div#catalog div#dropdown ul#dropdownUl, div#catalog div#dropdown ul li ul, .content, .games-list-container{ background-color: white !important; } .input-group::before{ width: 100%; content: "ROBLOX Simplicity, By sigve10"; position: absolute; left: 105%; top: 5px; font-weight: 500; } #header{ background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9) !important; } div#catalog div#dropdown ul#dropdownUl{ border: none; } div#catalog div#dropdown ul li ul{ border-left: #ccc 0px; } .navbar-header, .abp, .ads-container, .sponsored-game, #navigation > ul, #mCSB_1_container > ul > li.rbx-upgrade-now, .rbx-header .age-bracket-label{ display: none !important; } .chat-main, .dialog-container{ transition: height 0.5s; } #navbar-robux #nav-robux-icon #nav-robux-amount { display: block !important; opacity: 1 !important; position: absolute; bottom: 10%; right: 10%; transition: color 0.35s; color: rgba(0,0,0,0) !important; font-weight: bold; } #navbar-robux:hover #nav-robux-icon #nav-robux-amount{ transition: color 0.35s; color: #56B46F !important; } #navbar-robux:hover #nav-robux-icon .icon-nav-robux{ opacity: 0.25; } div#catalog div#PrivateSales{ overflow: visible; } .robux-grid .cell-content .thumbnail-holder .icon-pause, .item-card-container .icon-play, .item-card-container .icon-pause{ background-size: auto; } .game-card-container{ transition: width 0.5s !important; background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9); height: 180px !important; overflow: hidden; width: 100%; border-radius: 5px; } #my-recommended-games .game-cards .game-card .game-card-container{ height: 155px !important; } #my-recommended-games .game-cards .game-card .game-card-container:hover a .game-card-name-secondary{ position: absolute; width: 45%; list-style: none; bottom: 120px !important; left: 160px !important; } #my-recommended-games .game-cards .game-card .game-card-container .game-card-footer{ border: none; width: 45%; position: absolute; list-style: none; bottom: 100px !important; left: 160px !important; } #my-recommended-games .game-cards .game-card .game-card-container .game-card-vote{ border: none; width: 40%; position: absolute; list-style: none; bottom: 20px !important; left: 140px !important; } .game-card-container:hover{ transition: width 0.5s ease-in-out 1.5s !important; width: 200%; box-shadow: none; border: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.5); } .game-card-container:hover a .game-card-name-secondary{ position: absolute; width: 45%; list-style: none; bottom: 140px !important; left: 160px !important; } .game-card-container:hover .game-card-footer{ border: none; width: 45%; position: absolute; list-style: none; bottom: 120px !important; left: 160px !important; } .game-card-container:hover .game-card-vote{ border: none; width: 45%; position: absolute; list-style: none; bottom: 40px !important; left: 160px !important; } .vote-mask{ visibility: hidden; } #mCSB_1_container ul li a{ transition: padding-left 0.4s; } #mCSB_1_container ul li:not(:hover) a span:nth-child(2){ color: rgba(0,0,0,0) } #mCSB_1_container ul li a span:nth-child(2){ transition: color .4s; } #mCSB_1_container ul li a span:nth-child(3){ opacity: 0; transition: opacity .4s; } #mCSB_1_container ul li:hover a span:nth-child(3){ opacity: 1 !important; } #mCSB_1_container ul li{ padding-bottom: 10px; padding-top: 10px; } .obc-theme, .obc-theme .nav-content-inner{ background-image: none; } .obc-theme .forum-table-header th, .obc-theme .forum-table-footer, .obc-theme #header, .obc-theme #header .nav.rbx-navbar a, .obc-theme #header .nav.rbx-navbar a:visited{ background-color: white !important; } .notification-stream-wrap{ visibility: visible !important; transition: opacity 0.2s, right 0.2s !important; top: 52px !important; right: -400px !important; } #notification-stream-container, .notification-stream-body, .notification-stream-wrap.open .notification-stream-container{ height: 100% !important; max-height: 100% !important; } .notification-stream-wrap.open{ transition: opacity 0.5s, right 0.5s !important; right: 0px !important; } .notification-stream-wrap.open:root ~ #header > div > div.navbar-right.rbx-navbar-right > ul > li.navbar-icon-item.notification-stream.ng-scope{ right:350px !important; } #dropdownUl > li ul li a { background-position: left; background-repeat: no-repeat !important; background-size: contain; text-indent: 30px !important; margin-left: 5px; } #dropdownUl > li:nth-child(1) > ul li a, #dropdownUl > li:nth-child(2) > ul li a{ text-indent: 0px !important; margin-left: 0px !important; }
